title: Hand of the Creator
body:
History

The Age of Races

When the Astanan-Human groups had spent many Moons searching for a place to settle, Illubeline appeared to them as a Golden Rod from within the clouds. At the end of the Golden Rod was The Hand of the Creator. Illubeline promised them a homeland, never specifying when, and said that the Hand of the Creator must be given to those who help them find their homeland. The sculpture is made from the metal of a meteorite.

The Age of Awakening

When the Dakkharen made a deal with the Ussurians to fight against the Dark Conjurer in exchange for lands in which to settle, they did so with the agreement that land in the Ussurian region would be gifted to them. However, after defeating the Dark Conjurer's forces, the city of Mutasaih lay empty, and the Dakkharen agreed to take this as the homeland instead. The Hand of the Creator was gifted to the newly created Economic Council, a board of advisors who would assist Dakkharen in the ways of economy and trade.
preface: The Hand of the Creator is an artefact that was carried by the Dakkharen for many Years as they journied across the Lenitar Sands. It was given to the Astanan-Human groups by Illubeline after they were exhiled from the Northern Realm.
